title: Luxury home for sale
details:
Luxury home on the main ward place is for sale for Rs. 55 Million. This home is ideal for a small family or a bachelor. Conveniently located close to supermarkets, restaurants, schools, hospitals, and other facilities.

Features of this property are as follows:

4.25 Perches (Hard to see the acreage because the house has well utilized the space)
1,500 Sq Ft
1 Bedroom with built in wardrobe
1 Bathroom with luxury toilet fittings
Sitting room on the ground level
Spacious Kitchen with lot of cabinet space and stainless steel appliances
Breakfast Nook
Laundry Room
Small Study/Office Room
Master bedroom and sitting room have Air Conditioners
Titanium flooring
